name: Fireworks Factory
overview: Fireworks Factory, a “lost” original 1980s ColecoVision game finally gets a proper release! The goal of the game is to extiguish all the building fires and to chase Pyroman to prevent him from setting more fires! Once you have extinguished all the fires of a building, you will have to tackle the others! You must be strong, the factory is huge! Don't touch the fireworks! They could explode in your face! As the game progresses, it becomes more difficult as you will have more and more enemies to fight.
